All Classes

Class Description
Boat
This class gives boats pathfinding on the main level
Cannon
Used as a base for other cannon classes
CannonBall
Calculates angle between player and mouse location and fires a cannonball in that direction
Checkpoint
Used as a checkpoint on route in pathfinding, a path consists of many checkpoints, which when followed will result in the final destination
Coin
This class creates a coin in the level
College
Used to store all the methods required between all colleges
CollegeDefeatedScreen
This screen is displayed when the player has defeated a college It displays the message that the college has been defeated and offers a return to menu button
ConstantineMemoryGame
This class is the Constantine memory game
DesktopLauncher  
Fruit
Used to calculate an angle and fire a random fruit in that direction
GameCompleteScreen
This screen is displayed when all three colleges are defeated and the player has won
GameObject
Class that all objects in the game world extend
GameObjectHealth
Game Object with health abstract class
GameOverScreen
This screen is called when the player has been defeated a college, it contains a return to menu button and a quit button
GoldIndicator  
Goodricke
This class is the Goodricke college fight
GoodrickeCannon
This class is the cannon used in the Goodricke college fight
Health
Implemented by any object that has health
HealthIndicator
Displays a healthbar which has hearts
Langwith
This class is the Langwith college fight
LangwithCannon
This class is the cannon used in the Langwith college fight
LangwithCannonball
Used to carry out all processing required for cannonballs shot by LangwithCannon class
LevelManager
This class is the manager when the actual game is being displayed
MainLevel
This class is the main level of the game
MainMenuScreen
This screen displays the main menu, The buttons start game button and a quit game button
MyGdxGameTest  
PathFinder
A class used to take a level and produce pathfinding results
PauseScreen
This screen is displayed when the pause button is pressed, The buttons continue, quit, and mute music are available on this screen
PirateDucks
Main class for setting up the game
PirateDucksTest
This class is used to target the class PirateDucks with tests
Player  
Screen
This interface is used to create a new screen in the game Contains all the methods needed for a screen
UnitTest
Tests which are not tied to an individual class within the project (for example testing if files exist)
VictoryScreen
